Note: Helvetica automatically renders as Arial on Windows :(
Hover on each example to disable font-features

Body style (Vanilla/no settings applied)

★ Proportional numbers, ambiguous characters (I,l,1,O,0) :( ★

New Data style (tnum, kerning:none, character variants, stylistic sets)

★ Arial's stylistic alternates only display in Windows ★
★ Arial requires font-kerning: none to display TNUMs ★
★ Roboto displays tabular numerals by default ★

Sample paragraph with inline serial number

SF Pro (Mac only)

Donec ullamcorper nulla non metus auctor: I10O925241264l. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia.

Arial (not Helvetica)

Donec ullamcorper nulla non metus auctor: I10O925241264l. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia.

Roboto
